unnormalised: The excitement was palpable as the nation prepped for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023. Ads blared from every corner, chai stall conversations revolved around predicted scores, and even my grandmother, usually glued to her TV serials, knew that the opening match was scheduled for 05/10/2023. The entire month leading up to it felt like a never-ending buildup, a crescendo of hope and expectation for Team India.

unnormalised: I remember marking my calendar with a big, bold circle around 22/10/2023, the day India was set to face New Zealand.
